ai-dn31:27.1_0: “And how does a noble disciple cover the six quarters?
ai-dn31:27.2_0: These six quarters should be recognized:
ai-dn31:27.3_0: parents as the east, teachers as the south, partner and children as the west, friends and colleagues as the north, bondservants and workers as beneath, and ascetics and brahmins as above.
ai-dn31:28.1_0: A child should serve their parents as the eastern quarter in five ways, thinking:
ai-dn31:28.2_0: ‘I will support those who supported me. I’ll do my duty for them. I’ll maintain the family traditions. I’ll take care of the inheritance. When they have passed away, I’ll make an offering on their behalf.’
ai-dn31:28.3_0: Parents served by the children in these five ways show compassion to them in five ways.
ai-dn31:28.4_0: They keep them from doing bad. They support them in doing good. They train them in a profession. They connect them with a suitable partner. They transfer the inheritance in due time.
ai-dn31:28.5_0: Parents served by the children in these five ways show compassion to them in these five ways.
ai-dn31:28.6_0: And that’s how the eastern quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.
ai-dn31:29.1_0: A student should serve their teacher as the southern quarter in five ways:
ai-dn31:29.2_0: by rising for them, by serving them, by listening well, by looking after them, and by carefully learning their profession.
ai-dn31:29.3_0: Teachers served by their students in these five ways show compassion to them in five ways.
ai-dn31:29.4_0: They make sure they’re well trained and well educated. They clearly explain all the knowledge of the profession. They introduce them to their friends and colleagues. They provide protection in every region.
ai-dn31:29.5_0: Teachers served by their students in these five ways show compassion to them in these five ways.
ai-dn31:29.6_0: And that’s how the southern quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.
ai-dn31:30.1_0: A husband should serve his wife as the western quarter in five ways:
ai-dn31:30.2_0: by treating her with honor, by not looking down on her, by not being unfaithful, by relinquishing authority to her, and by presenting her with adornments.
ai-dn31:30.3_0: A wife served by her husband in these five ways shows compassion to him in five ways.
ai-dn31:30.4_0: She’s well-organized in her work. She manages the domestic help. She’s not unfaithful. She preserves his earnings. She’s deft and tireless in all her duties.
ai-dn31:30.5_0: A wife served by her husband in these five ways shows compassion to him in these five ways.
ai-dn31:30.6_0: And that’s how the western quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.
ai-dn31:31.1_0: A gentleman should serve his friends as the north and colleagues as the west.
ai-dn31:31.2_0: giving, kindly words, taking care, and equality.
ai-dn31:31.3_0: Friends and colleagues served by a gentleman in these five ways show compassion to him in five ways.
ai-dn31:31.4_0: They guard you when you’re negligent. They guard your property when you’re negligent. They don’t continue to give up residence. They don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-dn31:31.5_0: Friends and colleagues served by a gentleman in these five ways show compassion to him in these five ways.
ai-dn31:31.6_0: And that’s how the northern quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.
ai-dn31:32.1_0: A master should serve their bondservants and workers as the lower quarter in five ways:
ai-dn31:32.2_0: by organizing work according to ability, by paying food and wages, by nursing them when sick, by sharing special treats, and by giving time off work.
ai-dn31:32.3_0: Bondservants and workers served by a master in these five ways show compassion to him in five ways.
ai-dn31:32.4_0: They get up first, and go to bed last. They don’t steal. They do their work well. And they promote a good reputation.
ai-dn31:32.5_0: Bondservants and workers served by a master in these five ways show compassion to him in these five ways.
ai-dn31:32.6_0: And that’s how the lower quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.
ai-dn31:33.1_0: A gentleman should serve ascetics and brahmins as the upper quarter in five ways:
ai-dn31:33.2_0: by loving deeds of body, speech, and mind, by not turning them away at the gate, and by providing them with material needs.
ai-dn31:33.3_0: Ascetics and brahmins served by a gentleman in these five ways show compassion to him in five ways.
ai-dn31:33.4_0: They keep them from doing bad. They support them in doing good. They teach you what is good. They explain the path to heaven. They teach the path to the company of gods and humans.
ai-dn31:33.5_0: Ascetics and brahmins served by a gentleman in these five ways show compassion to him in these five ways.
ai-dn31:33.6_0: And that’s how the upper quarter is covered, kept safe and free of peril.”
